column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////In the past
column2: I've come for their chocolate chips cookies and macaroons
column3: but once I tried their pistachio croissant
column4: I never went back. This croissant is large and fluffy
column5: with a sweet and delicious paste lining the inside. The green color gives the croissant an especially pretty look. For drinks
column6: their iced mocha is rich and heavy
column7: yet refreshing. Whether spending time eating at this cafe or taking your food to go
column8: Common Bond is a wonderful place to get a bite.
